whoWeAreText: Welcome to Food Recipe – your go-to hub for delicious, easy-to-follow recipes from around the world. Whether you're a home cook or a beginner in the kitchen, we’re here to inspire your culinary journey.
whatWeOfferText: Hundreds of recipes across different cuisines.
whatWeOfferText3: Available in English & Urdu for better accessibility.
ourMissionText: Our mission is to bring people together through food. We believe cooking should be simple, fun, and shared with loved ones.

footer.aboutText: Food Recipe is your go-to source for easy and delicious recipes from around the world. Discover, cook, and share!
